adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: openai-group-1

model.title: Model
model.description: The model to use for the API request. Refer to https://platform.openai.com/docs/models

api_base.title: API Base
api_base.description: Provide the OpenAI endpoint. Example: https://api.openai.com/v1

api_version.title: API Version
api_version.description: Provide the API version. Refer to the documentation provided by OpenAI. Example: 2023-05-15

max_tokens.title: Maximum Output Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to limit LLM replies, leave it empty to use the maximum possible for the selected model.

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: The maximum number of times to retry a request if it fails.

enable_reasoning.title: Enable Reasoning
enable_reasoning.description: Allow the model to apply extra reasoning for complex tasks. May slightly increase latency and cost, typically within 20â€“50% depending on the level selected. Only applicable for [O series models](https://platform.openai.com/docs/models#reasoning).

reasoning_effort.title: Reasoning Effort
reasoning_effort.description: Sets the Reasoning Strength when Reasoning Effort is enabled
